name: com.nosirrahh.unityenvironmentsettings
description: UnityEnvironmentSettings is a solution for managing environment-specific settings in Unity projects. It enables developers to separate configuration data from code, making their projects easier to maintain and adapt to different environments such as development, staging, and production.

samples.description: This sample demonstrates the usage of Unity Environment Settings, showcasing how to load and manage environment configurations as resources using the Resources API. It includes an example manager and environment loader implementation to illustrate integration in a Unity project.
